questions.question: What does the TruVault warranty cover?
questions.answer: TruVault offers a lifetime warranty on the functional aspects of all suitcases purchased from January 1, 2025. This covers material defects and workmanship, but excludes cosmetic damage, misuse, or normal wear and tear.

questions.question: What is the warranty for items purchased before January 1, 2025?
questions.answer: Products purchased before January 1, 2025 are covered by a 5-year warranty from the date of purchase, provided the product is registered online within 30 days. Without registration, a standard 2-year warranty applies.

questions.question: How do I claim a TruVault warranty?
questions.answer: To make a claim, contact TruVault Customer Support with proof of purchase and product registration details. If approved, we will repair or replace the product and cover return shipping costs.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.answer: Once your order has shipped, you’ll receive an email with a tracking number and link. You can also track it through the 'My Orders' section on our website.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
questions.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 24 hours of placement. Please contact TruVault Customer Support promptly for assistance.

questions.question: What is TruVault’s return policy?
questions.answer: You may return your product within 30 days of delivery for a full refund using the prepaid return label provided in your account, as long as the item is unused, in original packaging, and in resalable condition.

questions.question: Can I exchange an item?
questions.answer: If you wish to exchange for a different color of the same model, contact us within 30 days. For different models or sizes, please process a return and place a new order.

questions.question: How do I care for my TruVault suitcase?
questions.answer: Clean the exterior with a soft cloth and mild soap. Avoid harsh chemicals. For aluminum models, you may use a non-abrasive polish sparingly. Always dry thoroughly before storage.

questions.question: How do I set the combination lock?
questions.answer: Our suitcases come with a factory-set code of 000. To change it: open the lock, press and hold the reset button, set your new three-digit code, and release the button. Always secure the dials afterward.

questions.question: Can I customize my TruVault suitcase?
questions.answer: Yes! Through our 'MyVault Customize' platform, you can choose case color, corner reinforcements, handles, and straps to make your luggage uniquely yours.

questions.question: Are accessories available separately?
questions.answer: Yes—replacement handles, wheels, packing dividers, and straps are available for purchase on our Accessories page.
